name: The Future of HTTP with Nick Shadrin and Roman Arutyunyan - Software Engineering Daily
summary: The Hypertext Transfer Protocol, or HTTP, is used to load webpages using hypertext links, and itâ€™s the foundation of the web. Tim Berners-Lee famously created HTTP version 0.9 in 1989, and defined the essential behavior of a client and a server. Version 1.0 was eventually finalized in 1996, and its secure variant called HTTPS is
